The best things in life are free right, I mean we’ve all heard that saying, so what if we told you you can win free Bitcoin? More importantly, what would you say to winning up to $5,000 worth of Bitcoin easily? Well now, winning Bitcoin is super simple, with MXC and the [MXC](www.mxc.org) $5,000 BTC competition giveaway! 

What’s the catch? Well, we do need just one thing from you, we want your attention! Yes, it really is that simple to win up to $5,000 worth of Bitcoin! The MXC Bitcoin giveaway works on a simple principle, watch the MXC News Updates, released every Monday, write down the lucky keyword each week and you could be the next winner in the MXC Bitcoin giveaway!

The MXC Foundation is one of the only crypto tokens that keeps its supporters up to date on a weekly basis, yes we are that dedicated to our community! Video News releases, Every. Single. Week! If you haven’t had the chance to catch up on the MXC news updates, and of course then getting your chance to enter the free Bitcoin giveaway, check out the MXC Foundation youtube channel, where the news is posted every Monday, [HERE](https://www.youtube.com/c/MXCFoundation).

An insider tip, subscribe to the MXC Foundation youtube channel in order to get notified as soon as the news is released, that way you’ll be the first to write down your Bitcoin giveaway word of the week! You can also follow the team and get involved in the Bitcoin giveaway or, a whole range of competitions from Bitcoin, to MXC Merchandise to MXC Airdrops! 

Check out the amazing work of the MXC Foundation and how they’re changing the world of Data, creating the Smart Cities of tomorrow! Visit MXC on [Telegram](https://t.me/mxcfoundation), [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/mxcfoundation) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mxcfoundation)! And you can be a part of the future of IoT, and who knows, with a bit of luck a future winner of the Bitcoin giveaway!
